p: Initially, the Novel Coronavirus has been referred to as 2019-nCoV. But during a news conference on Feb. 8, Chinas National Health Commission giveÂ the virus a temporary name, the Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia or NCP. However, the (2019-nCoV) has been recently named COVID-19 by the director-general of the World Health Organization (WHO) Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.
